refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Authenticate using a public hostkey read from a file. If privkeyfile is encrypted (which it should be), the passphrase must be provided. If local_username is omitted, then the value for username will be used for it.

example.title: Authentication using a public hostkey
example.programlisting:
<?php
$connection = ssh2_connect('shell.example.com', 22, array('hostkey'=>'ssh-rsa'));

if (ssh2_auth_hostbased_file($connection, 'remoteusername', 'myhost.example.com',
                             '/usr/local/etc/hostkey_rsa.pub',
                             '/usr/local/etc/hostkey_rsa', 'secret',
                             'localusername')) {
  echo "Public Key Hostbased Authentication Successful\n";
} else {
  die('Public Key Hostbased Authentication Failed');
}
?>
